item.title: [Python] Single pixel camera experience with Python
item.description: #Introduction **DeNA 20 New Graduate Advent Calendar 2019 article. ** I will be a Web engineer at DeNA from April next year, but I usually study optics at graduate school. When I introduce the research roughly, I change the shape of the laser and shoot it, or measure the object using light (By the way, if I display my Qiita account image on SLM and hit the laser, The laser splits into 100).
